title: Issue 6 - Configure Android environment
body:
## Description
Configure the project to run on Android, ensuring compatibility with recent versions.

### Tasks
- Generate APK/AAB for Android.
- Configure minimal required permissions (camera, storage).
- Validate execution on physical Android device.
- Update README with Android setup instructions.
- Update CHANGELOG with environment configuration entry.
- Reference design mockup available at docs/mockup.html.

### Acceptance Criteria
- App compiles and runs on Android without errors.
- APK/AAB can be installed on Android phone.
- Documentation updated accordingly.

title: Issue 5 - Support local Android emulator
body:
## Description
Enable running the application on local Android emulator (AVD).

### Tasks
- Configure Android Studio with emulator (AVD).
- Ensure the app launches and OCR executes in emulator.
- Document emulator setup in README.
- Update CHANGELOG with emulator support entry.
- Reference design mockup available at docs/mockup.html.

### Acceptance Criteria
- App runs in Android emulator without failures.
- OCR works correctly in emulated environment.
- Documentation updated accordingly.

title: Issue 4 - Basic Android testing
body:
## Description
Perform basic tests on the app running in Android (emulator and physical device).

### Tasks
- Test image capture in emulator.
- Test OCR in physical Android device.
- Validate PDF export in both environments.
- Update README with testing instructions.
- Update CHANGELOG with testing entry.
- Reference design mockup available at docs/mockup.html.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Core features (capture, OCR, PDF) work in Android.
- No critical errors during execution.
- Documentation updated accordingly.

title: Issue 3 - Implement Offline Scanner with OCR (Android)
body:
## Description
Implement the core functionality of the Offline Scanner app for Android.

### Tasks
- Capture document via Android camera.
- Process image with embedded Tesseract OCR.
- Display recognized text on screen.
- Ensure compatibility with emulator and physical device.
- Update README with usage instructions.
- Update CHANGELOG with OCR implementation entry.
- Reference design mockup available at docs/mockup.html.

### Acceptance Criteria
- User can capture a photo in Android.
- Recognized text appears below the image.
- Works fully offline in Android (emulator and real device).
- Documentation updated accordingly.

title: Issue 2 - Export OCR result to PDF (Android)
body:
## Description
Add functionality to export recognized text into PDF on Android.

### Tasks
- Integrate PDF generation library (e.g., pdf-lib) compatible with Android.
- Allow saving document in local device storage.
- Validate export in emulator and physical device.
- Update README with PDF export instructions.
- Update CHANGELOG with PDF feature entry.
- Reference design mockup available at docs/mockup.html.

### Acceptance Criteria
- User can save OCR result as PDF on Android.
- File is accessible on device and emulator.
- Documentation updated accordingly.

title: Issue 1 - Refine UI/UX of single screen (Android)
body:
## Description
Improve the design of the single screen of the Offline Scanner app in Android.

### Tasks
- Adjust color palette and typography for Android.
- Add icons for actions (capture, save, share, exit).
- Ensure responsive layout across different Android screen sizes.
- Validate UI in emulator and physical device.
- Update README with UI details.
- Update CHANGELOG with UI refinement entry.
- Reference design mockup available at docs/mockup.html.

### Acceptance Criteria
- Clear and intuitive interface on Android.
- Buttons visible and functional.
- Consistent design with minimalist proposal.
- Documentation updated accordingly.
